name: Tower Fall!
description:
You are falling down a tower! Land on each step and last as long as you can! How low can you go?! Instant addiction runner game featuring one-of-a-kind game play and 45 unique heroes. Can you collect them all?

Game Features:
- Endless downward runner game
- Instant addictive GamePlay
- Ultra Smooth animations
- Collect stars & Unlock Unique characters!
